[`var flags: UInt32`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnsfilterparameters/flags)A logical OR of zero or more values from BNNS flags.[`var n_threads: Int`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnsfilterparameters/n_threads)The number of worker threads to execute.[`var alloc_memory: BNNSAlloc?`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnsfilterparameters/alloc_memory)The function called to allocate memory.[`var free_memory: BNNSFree?`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnsfilterparameters/free_memory)The function called to deallocate memory.[`var allocator: BNNSAlloc?`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnsfilterparameters/allocator)[`var deallocator: BNNSFree?`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnsfilterparameters/deallocator)[`var threadCount: Int`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnsfilterparameters/threadcount)
